name: Corpus Misty Rift
description:
In the soft fleshy world of Corpus Misty past secrets are laid to rest and transformed into a fluid abstract world. See the spiritual guidance of Genesis P-orridge expand into a bodily skyscape, endure the complexity of being a spectacle as a black trans artist, hear the private tales of pussy modification, explorations in sexuality, and the healing power of time.

The Collective The Berlin based XR Coven is a FLINT collective building VR and AR experiences that explore sensationalized and forbidden aspects of intimacy, promoting wisdom and dignity over secrecy.
